description.english: Marry another character
description.schinese: 与另一位角色结婚

description.english: Complete an entire Lifestyle (all three trees)
description.schinese: 获得一套生活方式里的所有技能

displayName.english: A Legacy to Last the Ages

description.english: Complete an entire Dynasty Legacy
description.schinese: 完成一整条宗族传承路线

description.english: Create a Cadet Branch of your Dynasty
description.schinese: 创建所属宗族的支系

description.english: Have the maximum amount of dread
description.schinese: 恐怖值达到上限

description.english: Suffer from a Mental Break
description.schinese: 遭受一次精神崩溃

description.english: Use the Claim Throne scheme successfully
description.schinese: 成功使用宣称权位计谋

description.english: Have ten living children
description.schinese: 拥有十个在世的子女。

description.english: As Álmos Árpád, form Hungary and convert to Christianity
description.schinese: 作为阿尔莫什·阿帕德，成立匈牙利并皈依基督教

description.english: Starting as Duke Nuño of Portucale in 1066, form Portugal
description.schinese: 作为波图卡莱公爵努尼奥，成立葡萄牙

description.english: Have one hundred living dynasty members
description.schinese: 拥有一百位在世的宗族成员

displayName.english: A Name Known Throughout the World

description.english: Have your dynasty reach the highest possible Level of Splendor
description.schinese: 让你的宗族达到最高的宗族威望等级

description.english: Play until 1453
description.schinese: 玩到1453年

description.english: Reach the highest possible Stress level
description.schinese: 达到最高的压力等级

description.english: Starting as an Iberian Christian, convert all of Iberia to Christianity
description.schinese: 以一位伊比利亚的基督徒开局，使整个伊比利亚皈依基督教

description.english: As a Hindu ruler, hold all seven Hindu Holy Sites at the same time
description.schinese: 以一名印度教统治者，同时拥有全部七处印度教圣地

description.english: As a French Catholic, hold the Kingdom of Thessalonika without being vassalised to Byzantium
description.schinese: 以一位法兰西天主教徒，拥有并完全控制帖撒罗尼迦王国，同时并不拥有或臣服于拜占庭帝国

description.english: Reach the highest possible Prestige Level
description.schinese: 威望等级达到最高

description.english: Reach the highest possible Piety Level
description.schinese: 奉献等级达到最高

description.english: Have a child with the Inbred trait
description.schinese: 一个儿童拥有近亲繁殖特质。

displayName.schinese: 上主，光荣不要归于我们

description.english: Found a Holy Order
description.schinese: 建立一个骑士团

description.english: Have strong hooks on three direct vassals
description.schinese: 对三个直属封臣拥有强牵制

description.english: Know ten secrets simultaneously
description.schinese: 同时知道十个秘密

description.english: Have your Dynasty rule ten independent realms of at least Kingdom tier simultaneously
description.schinese: 让你的宗族同时统治十个至少王国级别的独立领地

description.english: Restore the Roman Empire
description.schinese: 重建罗马帝国

description.english: Starting as an Irish ruler, hold the Kingdom of Ireland
description.schinese: 以爱尔兰统治者开局，拥有爱尔兰王国

description.english: Starting as a Count, lead your line to rule an Empire
description.schinese: 以一名伯爵开局，领导你的血脉统治一个帝国

description.english: Starting as Matilda di Canossa in 1066, rule Italy, have 50 Dynasty members, and found a Holy Order
description.schinese: 在1066年以玛蒂尔达·迪·卡诺萨开局，领导你的宗族统治意大利王国，有至少五十位在世的宗族成员，并建立一个骑士团

description.english: Starting as an Iberian Muslim, control Iberia and take the Avenge the Battle of Tours decision
description.schinese: 以一位伊比利亚的穆斯林统治者开局，控制整个伊比利亚，作出“为图尔战役复仇”的决议

description.english: Starting as Robert the Fox in 1066, rule Sicily, hold a Greek Kingdom, and convert it to Catholicism
description.schinese: 在1066年以“狐狸”罗贝尔开局，统治西西里王国，拥有伊庇鲁斯、希腊或帖撒罗尼迦王国中的任意一个，并使该国所有的初始伯爵领皈依天主教

description.english: Starting as any of the Jimena siblings in 1066, become Emperor of Spain
description.schinese: 在1066年以任意一位希梅纳家族诸子开局，成为西班牙皇帝

description.english: Starting as any child of Ragnarr Lothbrok, conquer all of the British Isles
description.schinese: 以朗纳尔·洛德布罗克任意一子开局，征服整个不列颠群岛

description.english: Starting as Count Eudes of Anjou in 867, lead your Dynasty to rule the Kingdom of France
description.schinese: 在867年以安茹伯爵厄德开局，领导你的宗族统治法兰西王国

description.english: Starting as William in 1066, win the Invasion, become English, and have only English vassals
description.schinese: 在1066年以“私生子”威廉开局，赢得诺曼入侵战争，成为英格兰人，并使英格兰王国中在你之下只有英格兰人封臣。

description.english: Starting as Vratislav Přemyslid in 1066, lead your Dynasty to rule Bohemia and the Holy Roman Empire
description.schinese: 在1066年以弗拉季斯拉夫·普热米斯尔开局，领导你的宗族同时统治波希米亚王国和神圣罗马帝国

description.english: As Haesteinn of Montaigu in 867, hold any Kingdom tier title
description.schinese: 在867年以蒙泰居的海斯泰因，拥有任何王国等级的头衔

description.english: Starting as Rurik the Troublemaker in 867, lead your dynasty to rule the Empire of Russia
description.schinese: 在867年以“破坏和平者”留里克开局，领导你的宗族统治俄罗斯帝国

description.english: Have a strong hook on your Head of Faith
description.schinese: 对你的信仰领袖持有强牵制

description.english: Have three or more virtuous traits
description.schinese: 拥有三个或更多美德特质。

displayName.english: The Things Love Does for Us
displayName.schinese: 爱之于我，不是一蔬一饭

description.english: Have a lover save you from a murder attempt
description.schinese: 让你的情人将你从谋杀中拯救出来

description.english: Use a hook to modify a feudal contract
description.schinese: 使用牵制修改封臣契约

description.english: Defeat a faction in a war
description.schinese: 在战争中打败一个派系

description.english: Fully upgrade a duchy capital building anywhere in your personal domain
description.schinese: 在你的个人直辖领地内，完全升级一处公国建筑

description.english: Create a Faith
description.schinese: 创建一个信仰

displayName.english: The Things We Do for Love

description.english: Murder your lover's spouse
description.schinese: 谋杀你情人的配偶

description.english: Inherit a title from someone you murdered
description.schinese: 从被你谋杀的人手中继承头衔

description.english: Murder your spouse
description.schinese: 谋杀你的配偶

description.english: Take part in a successful Great Holy War, on either side
description.schinese: 参加一次成功的大圣战，加入任意一方

description.english: Go to war with one of your siblings over a Claim
description.schinese: 与你的一位兄弟姐妹为了宣称权进行战争

description.english: As any one character, successfully seduce ten people
description.schinese: 以任意角色，成功勾引十个人

description.english: While holding any empire title, be naked
description.schinese: 拥有任何帝国头衔的同时，浑身赤裸。

description.english: Have only two distinct parents, grandparents, and great grandparents
description.schinese: 父母、（外）祖父母和（外）曾祖父母，每一代都只有两个不同角色，不存在的祖先会被计为一个角色

description.english: Starting as a Karling, be the only independent Karling to hold a landed title
description.schinese: 以一位加洛林家族的成员开局，成为唯一一位拥有有领地头衔的独立加洛林家族成员

description.english: Increase your Rank
description.schinese: 提升你的级别

description.english: Have your culture unlock all innovations, excluding regional and culture-specific innovations
description.schinese: 让你的文化解锁所有革新，不包括地区性和文化特有的革新

description.english: Starting as Daurama Daura, have your line reform an African faith, and convert all of Africa to it
description.schinese: 以玛加吉娅道拉玛开局，改革一种非洲原始信仰，并使所有位于非洲的伯爵领皈依

description.english: As a Norse-Asatru ruler, have your capital on any island in the Indian Ocean
description.schinese: 以一位北日耳曼文化组（任意一种）的阿萨神族信徒开局并保持不变，让你的领地首都位于印度洋诸岛区域任意地点。

description.english: As an Asatru, hold all of the original Thessalonika, and any empire title other than Byzantium
description.schinese: 以一位北日耳曼文化组（任意一种）的阿萨神族信徒开局并保持不变，完全控制帖撒罗尼迦王国，并拥有除拜占庭帝国以外的任意帝国。

description.english: As an unreformed tribal, form the North Sea Empire
description.schinese: 扮演未改革的部落制国家，通过巩固北海至高王国决议

description.english: As a North Germanic Asatru, control all islands in the Atlantic and the Mediterranean, whilst keeping your realm size below a certain threshold
description.schinese: 以一位北日耳曼文化组（任意一种）的阿萨神族信徒开局并保持不变，完全控制大西洋及地中海诸岛区域的所有领地，但领地规模从来不超过80

description.english: As a Norse tribal, control the entirety of Sicily
description.schinese: 以一位北日耳曼文化组（任意一种）的阿萨神族信徒开局并保持不变，在1047年之前完全控制西西里王国。

description.english: Starting and staying as a North Germanic Asatru of any kind, take the Found Witch Coven Decision
description.schinese: 以一位北日耳曼文化组（任意一种）的阿萨神族信徒开局并保持不变，通过建立巫师集会决议

description.english: As any one dynasty, commission a hundred rune stones
description.schinese: 让你的宗族竖立一百块符文石

description.english: As a Christian North Germanic, participate in the very first crusade from the start
description.schinese: 以一位北日耳曼文化组（任意一种）的角色开局，在第一次天主教十字军中立即作为进攻方参战

displayName.schinese: 弗拉基米尔的第二种选择

description.english: As a North Germanic or Russian Asatruan of any kind, convert to any Islamic faith & convert all of Russia.
description.schinese: 以一位北日耳曼文化组（任意一种）的阿萨神族信徒开局，改信任意一种伊斯兰信仰，并使所有罗斯区域都改信任意一种伊斯兰信仰

description.english: As a dwarf, win a Varangian Adventurer war anywhere outside of Europe
description.schinese: 以一名侏儒，在欧洲之外赢得一场瓦兰吉冒险战争

description.english: Fund an Inspired character's Project, and receive the end result
description.schinese: 赞助一个有灵感角色的项目，收获最终结果

description.english: Create a Hybrid Culture
description.schinese: 创建一个融合文化

description.english: Create a Divergent Culture
description.schinese: 创建一个分支文化

description.english: Have an artifact in every slot in the Inventory and Court
description.schinese: 在宝物栏和朝廷中的每一个槽位中都有一件宝物

description.english: Reach the maximum amount of Court Grandeur
description.schinese: 达到宫廷显赫度最高级别

description.english: Personally know 10 languages
description.schinese: 本人会说10门宫廷语言

description.english: Sponsor 30 successful inspirations in one game
description.schinese: 一局游戏成为30个成功灵感的赞助者

description.english: Obtain a mythological rarity artifact from an Adventurer Inspiration
description.schinese: 通过探险灵感获得一件史诗宝物

description.english: Rule a realm containing at least 10 cultures with 95% or more acceptance of your culture
description.schinese: 统治一片领地，其中有至少10个文化的文化接受度为95%或以上

description.english: Be at least 6 levels above your expected Court Grandeur
description.schinese: 高于你宫廷显赫期望等级至少6级

description.english: As a member of the Pugyel Dynasty, re-create the Empire of Tibet
description.schinese: 作为悉补野宗族的一员，重建吐蕃帝国

description.english: As the Seljuk Count in Samosata, form Rum and create a Hybrid Culture between Oghuz and Greek
description.schinese: 在1066年以阿尔普·阿尔斯兰之外的任意塞尔柱家族成员开局，成立罗姆并创建一个乌古斯与希腊的融合文化

description.english: Starting as the Duke of Ghur in 867 or 1066, conquer the borders of the historical Ghurid Empire
description.schinese: 在867年或1066年以古尔公爵开局，征服历史上的古尔帝国区域

description.english: As the Piasts in 867, rule a Feudal Poland and own a Famed+ regalia, crown, weapon, and armor
description.schinese: 在867年以皮雅斯特王朝的一员开局，统治波兰，采用封建制，拥有一件名作级或卓越级的礼器、冠冕、武器和盔甲

description.english: Have every Royal Court speak your Court Language
description.schinese: 使全世界所有朝廷都说你的宫廷语言。

description.english: Starting and staying as a Jewish ruler in East Africa, rule a Kingdom and diverge your culture
description.schinese: 作为东非的犹太教国王，分离你的文化。

description.english: Appoint a character with a completed Adventure inspiration as your Antiquarian
description.schinese: 任命一位完成过探险灵感的角色担任你的古物研究官

description.english: Loot an artifact you do not have a claim on and pass it down to your heir
description.schinese: 劫掠获得一件你没有宝物宣称的宝物并传给你的继承人

description.english: With the County of Fika as your primary title, diverge your culture and spread it to 30 Counties
description.schinese: 以菲卡伯爵领作为你的主头衔，分离你的文化并将其传播到你或你封臣所持有的30个伯爵领

description.english: As a vassal king to an emperor, have a higher court grandeur than they do
description.schinese: 作为一名皇帝的封臣，拥有比皇帝更高的宫廷显赫度

description.english: Sleep with your best friend while having the "Ritualized Friendship" cultural tradition
description.schinese: 在拥有仪式化友谊文化传统的情况下与你的至交上床。

displayName.schinese: 巴斯克沐浴在我的荣光之下

description.english: Embrace the Basque paganism faith during the Iberian struggle
description.schinese: 在伊比利亚斗争期间接受欧斯卡拉宗教信仰。

description.english: Use a friendship hook on a different-faith ruler involved in the Iberian struggle
description.schinese: 在伊比利亚斗争中对一位异信仰统治者参与方使用友谊牵制。

description.english: Bet a title on a strategy game match against another ruler
description.schinese: 在与另一位统治者的战略游戏比赛中押下一个头衔作为赌注，并完成比赛。

description.english: As an Iberian culture character, control all of the Caucasian Iberia region
description.schinese: 以一名伊比利亚角色，控制整个高加索伊比利亚区域。

displayName.schinese: 安达卢西亚宗教裁判所

description.english: Convert all of Iberia to the Mozarabic faith
description.schinese: 使整个伊比利亚皈依穆扎赖卜派。

description.english: End the Iberian struggle through means of force
description.schinese: 以支配结局结束伊比利亚斗争。

description.english: End the Iberian struggle by setting your differences aside
description.schinese: 以缓和结局结束伊比利亚斗争。

description.english: End the Iberian struggle through compromise
description.schinese: 以维持现状结局结束伊比利亚斗争。

description.english: Start as an uninvolved character, become involved and end the Iberian struggle
description.schinese: 以一位无关方角色开局，成为参与方并结束伊比利亚斗争。

description.english: Create and rule the kingdom of Valencia as an heir to El Cid
description.schinese: 以一位熙德的继承人，创建并统治瓦伦西亚。

description.english: Visit ten Kingdom Tier Vassals on a Grand Tour
description.schinese: 在一场大巡游中访问十个王国等级封臣

description.english: As a Regent, sucessfully coup your liege to take their Realm without War or Schemes
description.schinese: 作为摄政，在不发动战争或计谋的情况下成功夺取你领主的领地

description.english: As an Emperor, go on an Intimidation Tour visiting all of your Powerful Vassals
description.schinese: 作为皇帝，在一场威吓巡游中造访你所有的强力封臣

description.english: Successfully host a Murder Feast or Bloody Wedding
description.schinese: 成功举办一次谋杀宴会或血腥婚礼

description.english: Finish both tracks of the Traveler Trait
description.schinese: 完成旅行者特质的两条路线

description.english: Finish any track in the Hastiluder Trait
description.schinese: 完成枪斗士特质的任意路线

description.english: Finish all tracks in the Hastiluder Trait
description.schinese: 完成枪斗士特质的所有路线

description.english: Orchestrate a Grand Wedding where the Spouses become Soulmates
description.schinese: 精心安排一场大婚，在婚礼上使配偶成为灵魂伴侣

description.english: Have one of your Lowborn Knights win a Grand Tournament Joust, then land them
description.schinese: 使你的一名出身卑微的骑士赢得一次比武大会马上比武，然后赐予其土地

description.english: Succeed with the Murder Intent while on a Hunt
description.schinese: 在一次狩猎中成功完成谋杀意图

displayName.english: Lions and Tigers and Bears, Oh My!
displayName.schinese: 狮子、老虎和熊，我的天哪！

description.english: Capture a large wild animal while on a Hunt
description.schinese: 在一次狩猎中捕获一头大型野兽。

description.english: Finish the Falconer track in the Hunter Trait
description.schinese: 完成猎人特质的驯鹰师路线

description.english: With one Character, go on Pilgrimages to all of your Holy Sites
description.schinese: 与任意角色一道，在朝圣中造访你所有的圣地

description.english: Participate in a Joust with a maxed out Horse track for the Hastiluder Trait
description.schinese: 在枪斗士特质的骑术路线达到极致时参与一场马上比武

description.english: Pass through every Terrain, including naval, whilst on the same Travel
description.schinese: 在同一次旅行中穿越所有种类的地形，包括海洋

description.english: Succeed at a Legendary Hunt
description.schinese: 成功完成一次传奇狩猎

description.english: Win every Contest at a Grand Tournament with at least three Contests
description.schinese: 在一场有至少三个比赛项目的比武大会中，赢得所有项目

description.english: Have a max rank Acclaimed Knight with the Warrior of the Faith Trait
description.schinese: 拥有一名带信仰勇士特质的最高级勋号骑士

description.english: Starting as the Habsburgs, rule the Archduchy of Austria, plan 5+ Grand Weddings and don't wage War
description.schinese: 以哈布斯堡家族开局，统治奥地利大公国，安排5次以上的大婚，并且不发动战争

description.english: Have a capital Barony with 60+ income, a stationed 500+ Heavy Cavalry Regiment and a mine
description.schinese: 首府男爵领有60以上的收入，500以上的驻扎重骑兵军团，以及一座矿

description.english: As a character of a faith with the Fadaeyeen Doctrine, dispose of a Lowborn, a King and an Emperor
description.schinese: 作为信仰拥有菲达因教义的角色，处理掉一位出身卑微角色，一位国王和一位皇帝。

description.english: Fill Five Tax Collector slots with excellent Aptitude characters
description.schinese: 用称职度杰出的角色填满五个税吏槽。

description.english: Take the Iranian Resurgence ending in the Iranian Intermezzo Struggle
description.schinese: 以伊朗复兴结束伊朗间奏曲斗争

description.english: Take the Renew Caliphate ending in the Iranian Intermezzo Struggle
description.schinese: 以复兴的哈里发国结束伊朗间奏曲斗争。

description.english: As a character of Iranian Heritage, hold the Empire of Persia, Kingdom of Thessalonika, and Kingdom of Hellas
description.schinese: 作为伊朗传承的角色，持有波斯帝国、帖撒罗尼迦王国和希腊王国。

description.english: Loot four Illustrious-Tier Vizier Extravagance Modifiers from your Vizier
description.schinese: 从你的维齐尔身上夺取四个名扬天下等级的维齐尔奢靡度修正。

description.english: As a character of a Faith with Jizya or Tax Nonbelievers Doctrines, have ten Vassals of other faiths
description.schinese: 作为信仰拥有吉兹亚或不信者税教义的角色，拥有十个其他信仰的封臣。

description.english: Starting as a member of the Umayyad Dynasty, hold the Empire of Arabia and the Sunni Caliphate
description.schinese: 以伍麦叶宗族的成员开局，持有阿拉伯帝国和逊尼派哈里发国。

description.english: Take the 'Found a New Caliphate' foundation as part of the Abbassid Humiliation ending in the Iranian Intermezzo Struggle
description.schinese: 选择“建立新哈里发国”，以阿拔斯的屈辱结束伊朗间奏曲斗争。

displayName.english: All Your Caliphate Are Belong To Us
displayName.schinese: 你所有的哈里发国都属于我们

description.english: Take the 'Dominate the Caliph' foundation as part of the Abbasid Humiliation ending in the Iranian Intermezzo Struggle
description.schinese: 选择“支配哈里发”，以阿拔斯的屈辱结束伊朗间奏曲斗争。

description.english: Contract, and recover from, the Bubonic Plague
description.schinese: 感染腺鼠疫并痊愈。

description.english: Reach the maximum level of Legitimacy
description.schinese: 达到正统性最高等级。

description.english: Travel to a safe holding while your Capital is infected by a Epidemic
description.schinese: 在你的领地首都受瘟疫影响时旅行至一处安全的地产。

description.english: As a Scottish character, complete a Legend claiming your descent from Ancient Egypt
description.schinese: 作为苏格兰角色，通过完成斯科塔诸子传奇来宣称你是古埃及后裔。

description.english: Manage to make your Legend Protagonist a Saint
description.schinese: 设法让你的传奇主角成为圣人。

description.english: Successfully claim your Liege's title while having a higher Legitimacy Level than them
description.schinese: 成功使用宣称头衔互动宣称你领主的头衔，同时拥有更高的正统性等级。

description.english: Have an infected Barony at the maximum Epidemic Resistance
description.schinese: 让一个受感染的男爵领达到最大瘟疫抗性。

description.english: Complete a Legend
description.schinese: 完成一项传奇。

description.english: Host a Funeral for your Legend Protagonist
description.schinese: 为你的传奇主角主持葬礼。

description.english: As a Count, complete a Mythical Legend
description.schinese: 作为伯爵，完成一项神话传奇。

description.english: Complete your ancestor's Legend after their death
description.schinese: 在你的祖先过世后完成其传奇。

displayName.english: The old man of the mountain

description.english: Complete Hassan-i Sabahs unique content by destroying an Empire
description.schinese: 完成哈桑·萨巴赫的特殊内容，摧毁一个帝国

description.english: Have every camp followers temperament be positive and have at least 10 camp followers
description.schinese: 使所有营地追随者的情绪为正面，并且至少有10名营地追随者

description.english: Complete El Cid's unique content with the 'An Honorable Man' ending
description.schinese: 完成熙德的特殊内容，达成“一位正直的男人”结局

description.english: As a Legitimist Adventurer, win a claim war for a Kingdom or Empire
description.schinese: 作为一名正统派冒险者，赢得针一场对一个王国或帝国的宣称战争

description.english: Choose to set out on an Adventure as a spawned Historical Character
description.schinese: 作为一名生成的历史角色，选择外出冒险

description.english: Choose a New Destiny 5 times in the same campaign
description.schinese: 在同一局游戏中选择新天命5次

description.english: As Baudouin of Jerusalem in 1178, defeat Saladin in a war
description.schinese: 作为1178年的耶路撒冷的博杜安，在一场战争中击败萨拉丁

displayName.english: New Management, same as the Old Management

description.english: As an Islamic Sultanate of Rum, adopt Administrative Government while owning Constantinople
description.schinese: 作为伊斯兰教的罗姆苏丹国，拥有君士坦丁堡的同时，采用行政制政体

displayName.english: Rags to Riches to Rags to Riches
displayName.schinese: 白手，起家，再白手，再起家

description.english: Starting as a Count, rule an Empire, become an Adventurer, then rule an Empire again
description.schinese: 以一名伯爵开局，统治一个帝国，成为一名冒险者，然后再次统治一个帝国

description.english: As Princess Tamar, rule all of Georgia and fully Conquer Armenia and Daylam
description.schinese: 作为塔玛尔公主，统治全格鲁吉亚，并完全征服亚美尼亚和答儿密

description.english: Become the Emperor of a newly-formed Latin Empire through a Crusade
description.schinese: 通过一场十字军东征成为新成立的拉丁帝国皇帝

description.english: Become a Dominant Family within Byzantium
description.schinese: 成为拜占庭帝国的主导家族

description.english: Adopt the Administrative Government via Decision
description.schinese: 通过决议采用行政制政体

description.english: Starting in 1178, Re-Establish the Theodosian Borders
description.schinese: 在1178年开局，执行决议重建狄奥多西的疆界

description.english: Upgrade your Estate with a lvl 5 Villa and fill all external slots
description.schinese: 将你的庄园升级为5级别墅，并填满所有外部槽位

displayName.english: It's OK, I Got a Permit

description.english: As a non-Powerful family, buy a Remit and successfully Raid the Estate of a Powerful Family
description.schinese: 作为非豪族，购买一份豁免权并成功劫掠豪族的庄园

description.english: As Co-Emperor, rule a Despotate
description.schinese: 作为共治皇帝，统治一个专制君主国

description.english: Have five simultaneous House members as Theme governors (not including you) while not being the Emperor
description.schinese: 并非皇帝的情况下同时有五名家族成员任军区总督（不包括你）

description.english: In 1178, start as the Palaiologos and become Emperors of Byzantium
description.schinese: 在1178年，以巴列奥略家族开局，成为拜占庭皇帝

displayName.english: Started from the Bottom now we're ERE
displayName.schinese: 出身底层，现为东罗皇帝

description.english: As an Adventurer, buy an Estate in Byzantium and lead your line to become Emperors
description.schinese: 作为冒险者，买下一处拜占庭庄园，领导你的血脉成为皇帝

displayName.english: The Stallion that Mounts the World

description.english: Starting as Temüjin, conquer the world
description.schinese: 以铁木真开局，征服全世界。

description.english: Use Overrun Realm CB and settle your people outside the Steppe
description.schinese: 使用占据王国宣战理由在大草原之外安顿你的人民。

description.english: Have 30 Tributaries
description.schinese: 拥有30个朝贡者。

description.english: Become the Greatest of Khans
description.schinese: 成为最伟大的汗。

description.english: Migrate from the eastern Steppe to the western Steppe
description.schinese: 以一位大草原东部草原的游牧统治者开局，迁徙至西部草原。

description.english: Build a Pleasure Dome
description.schinese: 建造一座大安阁。

description.english: Settle in the Steppe
description.schinese: 成为大草原上的定居统治者

description.english: Become Blood Brothers
description.schinese: 成为结义兄弟

description.english: Form a Confederation
description.schinese: 成立邦联

description.english: Host an Excellent Nerge
description.schinese: 举办一场举世无双的围猎

description.english: Starting as Jarl Hæsteinn in 867, become Hegemon of China
description.schinese: 作为雅尔海斯泰因，成为中国天子

description.english: Claim the Mandate of Heaven as the Head of Faith of a Christian faith
description.schinese: 作为一个基督教信仰的信仰领袖，宣称天命

description.english: Starting as the Crysanthemum Throne, restore direct imperial rule
description.schinese: 以菊花王座开局，达成天皇复政

description.english: As a Mandala ruler, have a Godlike level of piety, rule an empire, and have 100 radiance
description.schinese: 作为曼荼罗制统治者，达到神明临凡虔诚等级，统治一个帝国，并拥有100的光辉

description.english: Starting as landless, work your way up to becoming a Minister in China
description.schinese: 以无地者开局，最终官至中国朝臣

description.english: Claim the Hegemony of China and choose a name for your new Imperial Dynasty
description.schinese: 夺取天朝皇位，并为你的新皇朝选定一个国号

displayName.english: Cut off the Head... and the Body will Follow

description.english: Successfully use the Eradicate Casus Belli against a House that you have a Feuding Relation with
description.schinese: 成功针对与你家族关系为世仇的家族使用铲除宣战理由

description.english: Become Shōgun, holding the Empire of Japan, as Minamoto no Yoritomo in 1178
description.schinese: 作为1178年的源赖朝，成为幕府将军并持有日本帝国

description.english: Max out your mandala Aspect and have a Grand Temple Complex
description.schinese: 将你的曼荼罗相位升至满级，并拥有一座曼荼罗补罗

description.english: Finish the Confucian Education track and have 5 disciples
description.schinese: 升满儒家教育特质并拥有五位门生

description.english: Have max cohesion in your Bloc
description.schinese: 使你的集团获得最大凝聚力

description.english: Reach the highest level of Merit
description.schinese: 达到最高的贤能品级

description.english: Take the Unite the Husamguk decision
description.schinese: 采用统一后三国决议

description.english: Found the Dai Viet Empire
description.schinese: 建立大越帝国

description.english: As a Wanua ruler, adopt Mandala government through your Suzerain, and build a Capital Complex
description.schinese: 以一个村社制统治者开局，通过你的宗主国采用曼荼罗制政体，并建造你的第一个曼荼罗寺庙群

description.english: Pass all Exams with one character
description.schinese: 用一个角色通过所有科举考试

description.english: Starting as a ruler of a culture with no Silk Road Innovations, discover a Silk Road Innovation
description.schinese: 以文化没有丝绸之路革新的统治者开局，发现一个丝绸之路革新

displayName.english: Yes I need, I need my Samurai

description.english: Adopt Sōryō government as a Ritsuryō ruler
description.schinese: 作为律令制统治者，采用总领制政体

description.english: Starting as a character that has not passed any Exam, pass an Exam in China
description.schinese: 以未通过任何科举考试的角色开局，在中国通过一场科举考试

description.english: Permit a group of religious exiles to settle in your realm
description.schinese: 允许一群宗教流亡者在你的领地定居
